alert.note: Alert for Eastern Panhandle, Crescent Lake NWR; Niobrara Valley, Fort Niobrara NWR, Samuel R McKelvie National Forest (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 13 at 1:57AM CDT until April 13 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON CDT /11 AM MDT/ TODAY TO 9 PM CDT /8 PM MDT/ THIS EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 204 AND 208... The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from noon CDT /11 AM MDT/ today to 9 PM CDT /8 PM MDT/ this evening. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zone 204 Eastern Panhandle/Crescent Lake NWR, Fire Weather Zone 208 Niobrara Valley/Fort Niobrara NWR/Samuel R McKelvie National * TIMING...Noon CDT/11 AM MDT to 9 pm MDT Thursday. * WINDS...South 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 13 percent. * TEMPERATURES...In the 80s. * THUNDERSTORMS...Isolated dry thunderstorms which could start fires are possible this evening. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will spread rapidly and will be difficult to control. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Panhandle, Crescent Lake NWR; Niobrara Valley, Fort Niobrara NWR, Samuel R McKelvie National Forest
